scripts.clean: npm run clean:coverage & npm run clean:dist
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run specs
scripts.coverage: babel-node node_modules/.bin/babel-istanbul cover --include-all-sources -x index.js -x spec/index.js tape -- spec/index.js
scripts.validate: npm run test && npm run coverage >/dev/null && npm run review-coverage
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:umd & npm run build:umd:min & npm run build:node
scripts.build:umd: export BABEL_ENV=umd || set BABEL_ENV=umd && mkdir -p dist/umd && babel --out-file dist/umd/logwiz.js lib
scripts.build:umd:min: export BABEL_ENV=umd || set BABEL_ENV=umd && mkdir -p dist/umd && babel --no-comments --out-file dist/umd/logwiz.min.js lib && uglifyjs dist/umd/logwiz.min.js --mange --compress --mangle-props true --output dist/umd/logwiz.min.js
scripts.build:node: export BABEL_ENV=commonjs || set BABEL_ENV=commonjs && mkdir -p dist/node && babel --out-dir dist/node lib
